author: spajak
body:
I can't enter any special character (Polish) with keyboard, using right ALT + letter: `ęółśńćżź`. Just no reaction - nothing is showing.

I **can** enter this characters everywhere else (including cmd.exe) - except PowerShell Console.
I **have no** problem with printing any of the Unicode characters in any console.
I **have** Polish programmers keyboard input set.

Please help.

```
PSVersion                      6.2.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17763
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Remove PSReadline and check the issue again.

comments.author: spajak
comments.body: Yes, It was `PSReadLine`. I've reinstalled it and now everything it is working. Thanks!

title: Cannot enter Polish characters (diacritics) from keyboard
